Name: Name
Drag to edit, shift-click to remove: Drag to edit, shift-click to remove
poi_removal_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this POI?
unsaved_changes: You will lose unsaved changes if you leave the page. Click 'Save file...' from menu to save the changes.
setting_changes_note: Note: After changing settings you might need to reload this page. Please save your data before that.
Printable area: Printable area is shown as a grey box on the map.
help_dialog:
TOE (abbreviation for TOE Online Editor).

Editing

Activate drawing mode by clicking drawing button on the top of the page.

WhatWhereFunction
Double clickEmpty mapStart new area / add corner to selected area
Double clickArea cornerRemove area corner
Drag and dropArea cornerMove area corner
ClickEmpty mapUnselect area
ClickUnselected areaSelect area
ClickSelected areaEdit or remove area

Saving

To save your work, click Save tool button on the right side to download your work as file. To continue your work, click Open tool button to load the downloaded file.

Printing

To print an area, select area and click Print tool button on the right side.

This software is open source. The source code is available on github. If you have questions, you can send email to tuomas.jaakola_at_iki.fi
